propriedade.valor: select numfunc,numvinc,chave,dtini,dtfim,totdias,faltas,obs,pontpubl,dt_prescricao,dt_pgto_c_multa,pontlei,emp_codigo,maxperfer,minperfer,maxdiasperfer,mindiasperfer,abono_dir_gozo,abonoconstfer,adiant13fer,adiantsalfer,emprestfer,maxdiasvendfer,mindiaspvendfer,numdiasabonofer,dendiasabonofer,permite_fer_este_per,contdobroferias,min_dias_peraqfer,max_dias_peraqfer,exercicio,sem_pgto_multa,rowid_reg,desc_abonoconst, desc_abono_gozo,desc_adiant13,desc_adiantsal,desc_emprest,desc_permite_fer,desc_dobroferias,desc_semmulta,' ' atos, flex_campo_01,flex_campo_02,flex_campo_06,mindiasperprincfer from ergadm00264_peraqfer where numfunc = ? and numvinc = ? order by dtini desc
